:: Vamprah::

Vamprah was thinking a large while about the things that Squizzy had 
told her. Maybe it would be a good idea to explore the ship.

"You have a good idea, Squizzy, I could explore the ship and later, 
you can fix my optics circuits...Unless you whant do it right now." 
said the femme.
